程序包 GameConsole.View

  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    CardExchangeView
    This class is the GUI for the Card Exchange View Panel, showing player exchange card for infantry if the player has more than 3 cards
    ConquestRatio
    this class is responsible for displaying conquestRatio of a player.
    CountryButton
    This class is attach a button to each country
    DomiInfoPanel
    This class is the GUI for the domination View Panel, showing the world domination situation of the list of players
    LogPanel
    this class is the GUI for the logpanel, to show the any message when editing a conquest map.
    MapDisplayer
    The main entrance of the game
    PhaseView
    This class is the GUI for the Phase View Panel, showing the current phase of conquest game and current player
    TournamentGamePanel
    This class is the user interface for the beginning of the tournament mode where the user can select maps, computer players, number of games and turns
    TournamentResultPanel
    This class is the user interface for the beginning of the tournament mode where the user can select maps, computer players, number of games and turns
